story:
Why This Book Is Needed

This campaign’s goal is to raise $6,500 for a book covering the media war against Mayor Rob Ford under the working title “Lynched: The Media War against Rob Ford.” I am a Toronto-based writer and blogger, who has followed these events for years (often with total disbelief). Why is it important to publish a book about a person, who has been loathed by so many people?

Very few politicians in the history of Canada have been the target of such vicious and continuous campaign for destruction, organized by the media and special interest groups, as Rob Ford has been. The attacks started long before any of his personal problems were revealed. The lack of any sympathetic coverage about a man, who has dedicated his life to serving the taxpayers, is disturbing. Canada is described routinely as being one of the most polite and tolerant countries in the world, yet the “progressive” media here can easily destroy a person with the “wrong” political views. 

This is not just about Rob Ford – this is about exposing the ability of the media to belittle and ruin a person, any person. And I am not talking about criticism of his political views. That’s nothing – it is normal to criticize politician. The issue is about the horrific way in which a human being is treated – hounded methodically until his personality and his family are in shambles. It takes extreme strength to withstand such pressure and on the surface it looks that Ford has managed to handle the situation. However, his political career has brought him no visible benefits after the long battles with those who hate his politics, if we don’t count the satisfaction of his constituents. (Theoretically, he would’ve been better off working in his business, but when people with his convictions can’t hold an office, we will be served only by the professional political freeloaders.)

It is important to tell that story, because it is a precedent and a blueprint for dealing with any person who is not liked by the media and the elites, often just because she or he has views that don’t conform to what they think is better for us.

Telling the truth in a sea of hostility is not an easy task. You can’t rely on the mainstream media, because they routinely belittle Ford’s achievements and mock his supporters as mindless idiots. Using mainstream publishers is not easier either – it is possible to get a fat deal with them only if you follow the official line and keep close to the “sacred” principles of political correctness (as the authors who published books about his life have done). 

What We Will Need to Succeed

That leaves the self-publishing venue.

Unfortunately, in that case there is no publisher to bear most of the costs – the author has to take care of all steps in the publishing process. As I mentioned in the beginning, the estimated expenses are $6,500, which is a small fraction of what another fundraiser collected with the intention to ruin Ford. (That is how life works – often you can do good deeds with much less money.)

I also said that I have followed Rob Ford’s career for many years, collecting information and writing articles about him. At my website you can read that coverage. I have systematized tons of materials, mostly articles, which will be the basis for the book, including pieces that their authors may want to forget (I am probably being optimistic here). There might be a need for some extra research, but only a fraction of the money would be spent on that.

The bulk of the raised money will be spent on preparing the book for publication. That will include editing and proofreading of the manuscript (it is always important that a professional eye checks the work for errors and repetitions). The book will be published in two editions – electronic (iBooks, Amazon Kindle, Barnes and Noble, and downloadable PDF) and paperback. That would incur expenses for formatting both editions – design and layout; there are different requirements for that.

Both versions will also need cover art, which has to be formatted as an actual cover for each of them. A large amount will be spent on advertising and promotion, which are important if we want the book to reach as many people as possible. Also, money will be needed to fulfil and deliver the items provided in the perks.

If the campaign doesn’t reach its goal, I will cover the outstanding expenses myself, but that would slow down the whole process. There could be a delay in releasing the book. If we reach the goal, all the extra money will be applied to promotion and development of a similar future project.

What You Get in Return for Your Support

Talking of perks, here is what you will get for supporting that important book project. The name of every person, who donated, will be listed with gratitude on the webpage of the book project. Please let me know, if you don’t want your name made public.

For $10, you will get a personal thank-you e-mail; your name will be added to the book webpage as a donor. 

For $25, you will get a personal thank-you e-mail; your name will be added to the book webpage as a donor; you will also receive a postcard in the mail and a digital copy of the book in one of the e-book formats listed above (before the official launch).

For $50, you will get a personal thank-you e-mail, handwritten thank-you post card in the mail; your name will be added to the book webpage as a donor; you will also receive a collection of photos related to the subject of the book (in digital format) and a digital copy of the book personalized with your name.

For $100, you will get a personal thank-you e-mail; handwritten thank-you post card in the mail; your name will be added to the book webpage as a donor; you will receive a collection of photos related to the subject of the book (in digital format), three digital copies of the book personalized with your and your friends’ names and a copy of the printed edition signed for you or your friend.

For $300, you will get a personal thank-you e-mail; handwritten thank-you post card in the mail; your name will be added to the book webpage as a donor; you will receive a collection of photos related to the subject of the book (in digital format), five personalized digital copies of the book and three copies of the signed printed edition.

For $500, you will get a personal thank-you e-mail; handwritten thank-you post card in the mail; your name will be added to the book webpage as a donor; you will receive a collection of photos related to the subject of the book (in digital format), five personalized digital copies of the book and two signed copies of the printed edition, as well as an MP3 video player with unique videos related to the subject of the book (all shot by me).

For $1,000 you get all of the above – e-mail, postcard, name on the page, collection of photos, five digital copies, three signed paper copies, MP3 video player with videos – plus a dinner and a talk at a Toronto pub (travelling expenses to Toronto not included). 

PLEASE NOTE: All perks will be delivered in October 2014, with the exception of the printed copies of the book. Due to the complexity of the publishing process, the printed books will be delivered in November (you will be notified when and I will do my best to release that edition as early as possible).

Risks & Challenges

I am a reliable person and I complete every task I start, especially when other people’s money and trust are at stake. A possible risk is that some will probably try to sabotage and derail the project through personal attacks – and that is almost sure, considering the subject I am writing about. However, over the long years of writing on controversial subjects (even when they are controversial only in the minds of the saboteurs) I have received every possible threat, every insult and tons of hate mail. I know very well how to handle the hate; it is even getting boring to do so. Still, I will notify the donors on the webpage if anything like this happens.

Other Ways You Can Help

Of course, not everybody can contribute financially, even though they may support the project. In this case you can help in different ways – if you have a website, Facebook, Twitter or other social network account, or even only an e-mail, or if you speak to your friends only face to face, you can still let them know about this endeavor. You never know who and how is going to help to spread the word.

You can make the task easier, if you use the share tools provided by Indiegogo above.

story:
The What

This is the campaign for my new erotic adventure novel The Dragon Throne.  This time I am going full-on Heroic Fantasy with magic swords, dragons, and evil wizards.

On the edge of the desert lies the kingdom of Umar, a crossroads of empires now long in decline. Once their dragons ruled the skies, but now they are few – a dying breed. For years the king’s grip on the Umar has been slipping, and now only paid armies and the ancient force of dragonriders maintain the throne.

Azera, daughter of the king, is the last of that fading lineage, her father’s only heir. Azera’s claim to the throne is tenuous, dogged by whispered rumors that she is cursed by her albino skin. Azera burns to prove herself, but when her chance comes, it comes with a price of blood.

In the wild desert lands of the south a new threat arises – a sorcerer who wields ancient power and rouses the nomad tribes into revolt. To Azera’s shock, her father falls in battle, and worse, the master of the dragonriders betrays the kingdom and joins the enemy.

Alone, Azera must try and rally the kingdom. Her only ally is Shabako – the enigmatic leader of those dragonriders who remain loyal. He stands by her side, and though she does not know what drives his loyalty, she has no choice but to trust him. In a storm of crisis and treachery, Azera must fight to hold THE DRAGON THRONE.

So what makes this story so great?  Why should you support it?

  • High Adventure!  This is a classic Heroic Fantasy story with lost empires, magic swords, dragonriders, and treacherous politics.
  • Diverse characters!  As a story set in a kingdom with a varied ethnic makeup, the cast will not be just a bunch of white people.
  • Strong female lead!  Azera is the main character, a realistically depicted albino and a young woman who has to take charge.
  • Action!  You know I like me some violence, and I guarantee The Dragon Throne will feature plenty of battles, escapes, and swordplay.
  • Perks!  Ebooks, print books, and more!  Perks include jewelry, dragonscale ornaments, cameos, and bonus scenes.
  • And as always, there will be hot, steamy sex.  In Adventurotica you don't just have to imagine your favorite characters hooking up.

I am excited about this book.  I have not done a straight up dragons-and-swords fantasy as an Adventurotica story before, and I think it is going to be really good.  Please support me so I can keep writing the kind of plot-driven genre erotica no one else is doing!

What I Need & What You Get

  • Funds go to pay my rent, bills, etc.  This is it, this is my livelihood.  I don't have a day job, so this is what I do.
  • All perks are fulfilled by me, by hand.  You will get to see the book written almost in real time, as it posts on www.adventurotica.com chapter by chapter.  Once it is done, the ebook will follow almost immediately, and then the print book.
  • Even if I don't reach goal, everyone gets what they paid for, no matter what.

The Impact

Here's where I'm supposed to talk about how this project is important to the world.  Which probably seems silly, only I think this project - and others like it - are very important.  This is the cutting edge of the publishing business, and here I am trying to prove by example that a writer can make a living at what they want to do.  And I don't mean be one of the one-in-a-million longshots we all read about.  I mean being able to be good at what I do and with that carve out a career that can support my life.

  • Here I am dismantling the gatekeepers and the idea of the arts as a lottery.
  • I have run 13 campaigns to success before this one.
  • You help keep me alive, and I entertain you.  That's what I do here.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, the most important thing you can do is share.  The hardest thing about these campaigns is making my voice heard above the tumult of the internet and standing out.  Signal boost!  Reblogs, facebook posts, tweets - everything helps!

story:
A Peek at What We're Doing

David has spent the last seven years writing this novel.

 It is a story about the modern, the primitive and the forgotten America.

It is a story of the way spiritual experiences meet and dance, Christian, Muslim, Jewish, Buddhist, Atheist, Agnostic, and Native American.

 It is a story of the congregation, avoidance and confusion of black, white, brown, yellow and red folks trying to talk and to love.

 It is about war and love and sex, but, mostly... 

... it is about change. How we change. How the ugly in each of us... that which we all know so well...  can be changed to the beautiful. In this novel there are powerful fans to blow aside the fog and there are bits of light to drive away the shadows, so we can see our path more clearly. We believe this life-changing and powerful story will affect many, many lives.

We are raising the money to self-publish this book. A talented and wonderful team has assembled around David which includes experts in social media, graphics, editing and management. With these funds his powerful story can reach many people... to entertain and stimulate, to lift spirits and change lives. 


What We Need

We intend to raise $19,793 for expenses from now through February of 2015.

     •Costs for Constant Contact, Dropbox, and Shopify: $552

     •Cost for Travel, Lodging and Promo Materials: $1,000

     •Print & Ship the Advanced Reader's Copy (ARC): $1,137

     •Graphic Artist: $3,600

     •Web Design, Graphics and Social Media Management: $4,550

     •Printing 2,000 hard cover books with 4 color dust jacket: $8,954

     

Some Great Goode-ies if you Donate

Take a look at our perks. Have fun. Donate. Maybe we'll see you in Vermont for dinner and deep conversation. 


    The Impact

    Whatever potential for a valuable impact this book may have, we don't want that potential reduced because people are short of money. Lack of money should never rob someone of a gift that could help their life. Anyone who is experiencing financial challenges can buy this book from our website store based on their available income. If someone is really broke, we'll send it to them for the cost of the book and shipping. Under some circumstances, where we feel there is a real need for the book, and the person cannot afford it, we'll send them the book free of charge.

    It is our hope that the high literary quality of the book, its insights, and the power of the story will draw people to the deeper things of life... those that carry us into compassion, love, charity and that continue beyond this life.

    It is our intention that this book will have an effect on the political, religious and cultural dialogue in our world. We believe that until our hearts change, the ills of war, prejudice, global warming, sex slavery and abuse will continue to plague us. We want this book to change our hearts... to help make our world a place of peace, love and forgiveness.

    Risks & Challenges

    We trust we have a brilliant and potent novel. The big question: How do we get it out there? 
    Some simple answers:
    We have a mailing list of over 2,200 people. We plan an email campaign in which we will send out David's poetry on a weekly basis. The Epigraphs that begin each chapter of the novel will be sent on a bi-weekly basis, and we will send emails to announce our website, the publication of the novel, and our Indiegogo campaign. Our goal is to build a large cyberspace community.
    We will utilize social media to communicate and to announce all the above. This will include Facebook, You Tube, Twitter, Google Plus, Linked In, our website and emails through Constant Contact. 
    We will be selling the novel through our website and through independent book stores. We will avoid using companies who focus only on the profit motive and do not have a broader vision of the need to create a kind and sustainable world. 
    This book will get printed whatever the outcome of this campaign. But, if this campaign is not successful, it will take a lot longer to raise the funds, and we will be forced to buy smaller quantities of books at a higher price. More importantly, we will not have the resources to reach the larger number of people who might be touched by this book.
    Success will not be measured by the amount of money we make. Success will be measured by the number of people we touch... by the number of lives we change with this novel. Your contribution will give us the muscle to reach a much larger audience... the muscle to help create that change the world needs so desperately. 
    David, the author, is a natural connector. He loves people. Most of the 2,000 plus people on the email list are people he knows personally. He is near the end of the editing process on the novel and will soon be able to devote full time to contacting people about the book.
    He has already talked to many reviewers, including Alan Cheuse from NPR, who has agreed to read the ARC. He has talked with Robin Young, co-host of 'Here and Now', a NPR news and culture program. She has also agreed to read the ARC. She has a wonderful spirit, and it is our hope that she will love the book and want to interview David on her show. 
    No matter what happens, we will reach some people. We will touch some people. In that regard, success is certain.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      The biggest way you can help is to tell people about this campaign. Encourage them to read this Indiegogo presentation and to check out our website. Encourage them in person, and on social media.  Encourage them to contact the author, see what we are all about, and give feedback.

      Once the book is printed, please read it.  If you are enthusiastic, please spread your enthusiasm... by word of mouth and through social media. Feel free to contact the author at any time.

      There are some specific people we are trying to reach. People who we believe are kindred spirits and would appreciate and speak out about the novel. If you know any of these people or know how to contact them, please share the book with them or send us their contact info and we will send them an ARC or the book. Here are a few of the names we have on our list.  As we think of more, they will be posted on the web site; Chris Hedges; Terry Gross; Tavis Smiley; Tom Ashbrook; Fr. Richard Rohr; Maureen Corrigan; Nicolas Kristoff; Dr. Cornell West; Robert Reich; Oprah; Arianna Huffington; Krista Tippett; any reviewers, revolutionaries, or movers and shakers in the literary world.

story:
Story of My Book

Rule By The People

My book explores several areas of politics such as how to participate, current political debates and other elements like voting systems that are rarely taught in school but are vital to a comprehensive political knowledge.

My name is Erin and I am the author of Rule By The People. I wrote this book as it is essential people have a basic understanding of politics to ensure they can make informed decisions that help convey their beliefs and needs.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover ways in which you can participate which go beyond the obvious act of voting. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for politics in you. And then ultimately I want you to see this book as a tool to help you further engage in politics and widen your knowledge on relevant debates.

In this book, you'll learn about how to get involved in politics and how people are already getting involved. You will learn:

Why participation is so essential to our democracy and suggestions as to how to do this

The impact young people can (and do) have, and why they face certain barriers

About important issues that are having a significant effect on our current political system

You will love this book if you want to learn more about politics or are looking for reasons to get involved.

Rule By The People is a non-fiction book that speaks to young people and those who want to engage more who are looking at participating for the first time or furthering their knowledge.

 

The Book - Rule By The People

The book is written in 3 Parts...

Part 1 contains the introduction + additional chapters. It concentrates on participation, focusing on the importance of getting involved and why people may not. The first part of the book also features suggestions as to how to participate, as well as offering examples of inspiring people and organizations that are changing the political game.

Part 2 contains Chapters 7-10. It discusses current political debates and issues that are important to know about to make informed choices. This section looks at issues such as mandatory voting and the potential problems that could arise from introducing this and other controversies. For example, whether sixteen- and seventeen-year-olds should get the vote.

Part 3 contains Chapters 11-13. This part focuses on areas of politics that are essential to an understanding but tend to be overlooked. It examines areas such as the multiple voting systems used in the United Kingdom and the advantages and disadvantages of these. It also discusses other political structures like dictatorships and autocracies that differ to the democracy we know.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in February, 2020.
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this winter.
When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

About the Author

Erin McBride is an undergraduate student of the University of St Andrews in her third year of a degree in Management and International Relations, currently focusing on Organisation Studies and International Law.

She wrote this book as she has always had an interest in politics and felt it was difficult to find relevant information that would allow her to effectively participate and share her beliefs to the extent she wanted to.

After missing the deadline to vote in the Scottish Independence Referendum by a few months, Erin felt the disappointment of being restricted from participation firsthand which spurred a keen interest in politics. Despite being constantly frustrated and disheartened with the current state of our political system, Erin is always hopeful that she’ll get her chance to finally vote in another Independence Referendum.

For more information you can connect with Erin at erinmcbride12@gmail.com or through Instagram: @erinnmcbridee or Facebook: Erin McBride.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #RuleByThePeople and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Erin

Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #RuleByThePeople and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.
Thank you so much of all of your love and support!Thanks again,Erin

story:
About the Book

How to Arrange Physics and Geography to Your Advantage is Charlie Getter's first collection of new poems since 2011's three-volume collection, The Garrulous Progress.

At once accessible, clever, and fun, How to Arrange Physics and Geography to Your Advantage is more than meets the eye. As one of the poems contained therein ("I live on an iceberg") might imply, there's much beneath the surface, and like a fine Scotch chilled with Arctic ice (that's a reference—get the book and find out!), these poems are delightfully witty on the nose, yet develop a complex and beguilingly nuanced character when savored.

About the Author:

Charlie Getter is the author of four poetry collections, and his work has appeared in numerous anthologies, journals, zines, and other publications. He's a founding member of the Collaborative Arts Insurgency (CAI), the group of artists, poets, emcees, and musicians responsible for the genesis of the ongoing 16th & Mission street arts workshop that takes place every Thursday on the streetcorner at 16th & Mission in San Francisco's Mission District.

About seven7h tangent

seven7h tangent was founded in 2007 by a loose collective of writers, artists, poets, and designers who share a love of literature, out of a desire to bring the work of San Francisco's street poets and writers to your bookshelf. One of our earliest projects was The 16th & Mission Review, a hand-bound bimonthly anthology featuring writing from the Thursday night gatherings, and distributed for free.

Your support for How to Arrange Physics and Geography to Your Advantage directly supports our ongoing efforts to elevate the voices of San Francisco's literary underground.

story:
Que?

A chave no peitoril trasládanos a unha Galicia que, no tempo, está moito máis preto do que pensamos.

Buscando a felicidade e fuxindo dun ambiente hostil, Sabela saíra da aldea soa. Despois de nove anos durante os que estuda, traballa, namora... un feito dramático obrígaa a regresar precipitadamente e revivir todos os recordos dunha infancia chea de soidade, humillación illamento, inxustiza. Tiña que atopar respostas para cumprir unha promesa... pola súa nai, pero ademais porque só así podería poñer en marcha o motor do esquecemento.

Quen?

Do Peirao é unha editorial con vontade de cambio, de publicar obras poco convencionais pero de incuestionable calidade, con novas e refrescantes ideas como é o empregar unha campaña preventa para valorar a aceptación e viabilidade de cada título.

Deste xeito es ti, agora que te estás expondo como colaborar, o que decide se a obra que che presentamos verá a luz pasando a formar parte do noso catálogo... porque consideramos ao lector parte fundamental do proceso.

Hoxe presentámosvos a Azucena Arias Correa.

Reside e traballa en Pontevedra, unha cidade na que sempre atopa algo marabilloso que ver, facer, comentar... É mestra, licenciada en Ciencias da Educación, en Psicoloxía e doutora en Didáctica das Ciencias Experimentais.
            Sempre metida entre libros e papeis (agora máis que entre papeis, ante a pantalla do ordenador), gústalle escribir e faino sempre que pode. Leva publicadas obras literarias como: A cirurxiá (1998), A casa do grilo e da chicharra (2000), A cadela e o óso (2001) e Debaixo dun parasol (Xerais, 2017), ademais dalgúns textos na biblioteca virtual galega (www.bvg.udc.es) e poemas en obras de colaboración. No ámbito académico ten publicados diversos artigos en revistas e xornais especializados e varias obras en coautoría relacionadas coa cultura galega e propostas didácticas para a escola («Festas anuais na escola», «As adiviñas», «O Magosto», «O Nadal»... ); tamén outras relacionadas coa metodoloxía, a didáctica e a innovación («Traballar por proxectos nas aulas de infantil e primaria», «O proceso de adaptación... ¿E ti vas á escola?», «O traballo por proxectos en infantil, primaria e secundaria»...), coa perspectiva de xénero na educación («A igualdade como solución») primeiro premio no VI Concurso Literario Rosa de Cen Follas na modalidade de poesía coa obra Silencio cómplice (2013). 

Por que?

Por aquí un fragmento do texto como mostra:

«A avoa Manuela era unha muller moi activa. Nada pasaba na aldea sen que ela o soubese. Polo menos dende un tempo a esta parte. Hai uns vinte anos non soubera ver como unha traxedia de desmesuradas dimensións sacudiría á familia.
          Ás noites a avoa aparecía pola casa. Polas noites. Non quería que a visen entrar na casa dun renegado, era ao cabo a casa dunha ovella negra da familia. O seu fillo sementara a vergoña no fogar e non quería que esa vergoña chapicase ao resto da parentela. A familia nunca saíra daquel val, o máis lonxe que estiveran era a cidade, a capital de provincia que queda a uns catro quilómetros. Esa aldea era o seu mundo, o único espazo cómodo e coñecido polo que moverse e seguir alí era máis que un desexo unha necesidade.
          Entraba na casa. Non dicía moito e levaba sempre algunha cousa, basicamente comida».

Como?

Para arrincar o proxecto fixámonos como obxectivo 880€; esta é a cantidade que recadariamos se ao redor de cincuenta mecenas se fixesen, cada cal, cun exemplar desta primeira edición.

  • Tendo acceso ás galeradas de edición.
  • Recibindo un exemplar semanas antes da saída ao mercado da obra.
  • Aínda que, tamén poderías ver o teu nome nos agradecementos achegando un pouco máis.

Ademais...

Sabemos que son tempos difíciles, tamén nós os sufrimos, e é posible que non esteas en disposición de apoiarnos co teu mecenado nestes momentos... pero agardamos que se isto te chegou á alma, mesmo se talvez coñeces en persoa á autora, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-orella... ) para que academos a nosa meta e Azucena Arias Correa vexa publicada a súa obra.

Grazas polo voso tempo.

Política de privacidade

story:
***for English, please scroll down***
 

Moje ime je Tomica Kristić - putnik, putopisac, i hodač na duge staze. 
Prošle godine završio sam četverogodišnje putovanje, koje volim nazivati svojim životnim pothvatom. Krenuo sam iz Hrvatske i kopnenim putem završio na Novom Zelandu. Nešto više od 1500 dana putovao sam preko triju kontinenata koristeći samo jedno specifično i nesvakidašnje prijevozno sredstvo - autostop! 'Prestopirao' sam preko 40 000 km, a kad sam konačno stigao na cilj, autostop sam zamijenio stopalima te sam prehodao cijeli Novi Zeland. 1500 km u tri mjeseca.
Na put sam krenuo sa samo 10 000 u džepu, tako da je putovanje spadalo u kategoriju niskobudžetnog. 


Putovanje mi je donijelo na stotine zanimljivih priča, te isto tako nagradilo velikom dozom životnog iskustva koje sam odlučio podijeliti s vama. I zato sam odlučio napisati knjigu o svom putovanju. Devet mjeseci svakodnevnog pisanja to se i ostvarilo, a knjigu sam nazvao Putovanje u Međuzemlje. Knjiga mi ima preko 350 stranica, a u njima možete pročitati kako sam: 

  • Radio kao stažist u bolivudskim filmovima u Indiji
  • Stopirao 2400 km preko omanske pustinje
  • Živio s lejdibojevima u Tajlandu
  • Družio se sa šamanima u Indiji na najvećem spiritualnom festivalu na svijetu
  • Spavao na policijskim postajama diljem Azije
  • Stopirao po Bliskom istoku
  • Volontirao u školi sa nezabrinutom djecom u Indiji
  • Dva tjedna planinario po Himalaji i popeo se na 5416 nadmorske visine
  • Pio alkohol u Iranu
  • Bio u zatvoru
  • Spavao u domovima lokalnih ljudi diljem svijeta
  • Zaljubio se 

Ovo je samo jedan malen dio događaja od jedne velike višegodišnje priče koja je ispisana na stranicama moje debele knjige. 

 

Zašto vam se obraćam?

Odgovor je vrlo jednostavan - zato što trebam vašu pomoć!
Da bih izdao svoju knjigu čiji je proces abnormalno skup, potrebna mi je vaša pomoć. Potrebni ste mi vi, trebam Vas da podržite ovu kampanju i pomognete mi da mi knjiga ugleda svjetlost dana. I ona bi voljela koračati ovom lijepom planetom, a ne samo mi. A kad se to jednom dogodi, već sljedeći dan doći će na vašu adresu i pokucati vam na vrata.

 

Kako možete biti dio moje kampanje?

Proces podržavanja kampanje vrlo je jednostavan: na desnoj strani ove stranice izaberete nagradu (perk) koja vas zanima, kliknete na nju i kupite ju. 
Da bi dobili oštriju sliku svega, ovdje dolje stavio sam fotografije nagrada čijom kupnjom možete podržati ovu kampanju:
 

e-KNJIGA :

Digitalna verzija knjige. Možete ju kupiti posebno, a možete i u kombinaciji s tiskanom knjigom.

 

KNJIGA :

Potpisani primjerak Putovanja u Međuzemlje.
 

RAZGLEDNICE :

Dobijete 3 razglednice mojih fotografija s putovanja. Za odabir kliknite na razglednice, nakon što izaberete, brojeve istih pošaljite mi na e-mail tomica.book@gmail.com
 

FOTOGRAFIJA NA ZIDU :

Sve ponuđene fotografije su moje. Fotografije su u veličini 90x60 cm, printane na visokokvalitetnom foto papiru. Za odabir kliknite na fotografija na zidu, a nakon što ju izaberete, broj iste pošaljite mi na e-mail: tomica.book@gmail.com

 

ZIDNA TAPETE (manja) :

Zidna samoljepliva tapeta veličine 120x 220 cm. Pošto je u pitanju interijer, veličina tapete je vrlo flaksibilna, i možemo se lako dogovoriti da ju podesimo prema veličini vašeg zida. Sve ponuđne fotografije tapeta su moje. Za odabir fotografije kliknite na foto tapeta manja, a nakon što ju izaberete, broj iste pošaljite mi e-mail: tomica.book@gmail.com

 

ZIDNA TAPETA (veća) :

Zidna samoljepliva tapeta veličine 300 x 220 cm. Pošto je u pitanju interijer, veličina tapete flaksibilna, i možemo se lako dogovoriti da ju podesimo prema veličini vašeg zida. Sve ponuđne fotografije tapeta su moje. Za odabir fotografije kliknite na foto tapeta veća, a nakon što ju izaberete, broj iste pošaljite mi email: tomica.book@gmail.com

 

VIJETNAMSKA KAVA :

Najbolja kava na svijetu :) konačno vam je sada dostupna. Savršeni napitak za savršeni početak dana. Kava je pakirana u (500g), i uz nju dobite FILTER te KONDENZIRANO MLIJEKO (380g).

 

VIJETNAMSKI ŠEŠIR :

Kad netko spomene Vijetnam, odmah pomislimo na kosooke ljude sa konusnim šeširima na glavi. Definitivno najprepoznatljivi dio njihove kulture, zemlje koja je moj drugi dom. Naručite svoj primjerak ovdje i stići će vam na kućnu adresu. Naravno, uz knjigu.

 

UPOZNAJ AUTORA :

Uručujem ti potpisanu knjigu osobno, i častim te s rundom pive, dvije, tri...ovisi o raspoloženju :) 
Destinacija: Zagreb i Varaždin.
 

PREDAVANJE (TRIBINA):

Dolazim u tvoju firmu, kafić, restoran, poslovni ured, školu, knjižnicu...
Održat ću dvosatno multimedijsko predavanje na temu mog četverogodišnjeg putovanja po svijetu.

 

...i još mnoge druge.
 

Da bi dobili još precizniju sliku nagrada (perkova), bacite oko dolje na tablicu:

Ako među nagradama nema kombinacije koju biste vi željeli, slobodno mi pošaljite mail pa ćemo se dogovoriti. Složit ćemo nagradu prema vašim željama. 

 

 

 

I par riječi za kraj

Hvala vam što još uvijek sve ovo čitate, i nadam se da će vam se svidjeti moja knjiga.
I tko zna, možda će vas moja priča potaknuti da i sami učinite nešto slično. Da raširite krila i odletite u svijet. Nije teško. Jednostavnije je nego što mislimo.

Ako imate bilo kakvih pitanja ili nejasnoća, slobodno nam pišite na mail tomica.book@gmail.com
Slobodno me pratite na facebooku, instagramu i YouTube-u.

Ljudi, hvala vam velika na podršci!

 

 

*********ENGLISH VERSION*********

My name is Tomica Kristić - traveler, travel writer, thru-hiker.
Last year I finished 4 years long travel, which I like to refer to as my life venture. I started in Croatia and ended up in New Zealand - all by land. It took me more than 1500 days and 3 continents using one specific and unorthodox means of transport - hitchhike! I hitchhiked more than 40 000 km, and upon arrival I switched my thumb for my feet and walked the entire New Zealand. That’s 1500 km in 3 months. I started my journey with $1.500 in my pocket, so I consider this trip as a low-budget one.

This journey brought me hundreds of interesting stories, at the same time rewarding me with a huge amount of life experience which I decided to share with you. That’s why I decided to write a book about my journey. After 9 months of daily writing it came true, naming my book Journey to Middle-earth. It consists of 350 pages amongst you can read about:

  • my acting (extras) in few Bollywood movies in India
  • hitchhiking over 2400 km of Oman desert
  • my ladyboy roommates
  • how I made friends with Indian shaman at the largest spiritual festival in the world
  • sleeping inside police stations across Asia 
  • hitchhiking through the Middle East
  • volunteering in a school with abandoned children
  • 2 weeks mountain climbing to the Himalayas, reaching 5.416m altitude
  • drinking alcohol in Iran
  • my time in jail
  • sleepovers in local people homes all over the world
  • falling in love

These are just small bits of a perennial story hidden inside my book’s covers.

 

Why am I talking to you?

The answer is pretty simple - I need your help!
In order for my book to be published - a very expensive process - I need Your help. This book needs You, Your support for this campaign in order for it to see the light of a day. This book would like to travel this beautiful planet as well. And when that day comes, it will arrive at your address the very next day, knocking at Your door.

 

How can you contribute?

The process is very simple: on the right side of this page click the perk that you find interesting, and buy it.
To get a more precise picture, you can find photos of perks below:

 

e-BOOK :

Digital version of my book. Available with printed version too.


BOOK :

Signed copy of "Journey to the Middle-earth" book.


POSTCARDS :

You get 3 postcards of my photos from the journey. To select click on postcards, then send the numbers on following e-mail tomica.book@gmail.com

 

PHOTO ON THE WALL :

All of the photos are made by me. Available in 90x60 cm size, printed on high-quality photo paper. To select click on photo on the wall, and the number of the picture send to my email tomica.book@gmail.com

 

WALLPAPER (small size) :

Self adhesive wallpaper, size 120x220 cm. Since all the walls are different sizes, selected wallpaper can be adjusted to Your wall size. All of the photos are made by me. To select click on wallpaper small, and the number of the picture send to my email tomica.book@gmail.com

 

WALLPAPER (big size) :

Self adhesive wallpaper, size 330x220 cm. Since all the walls are different sizes, selected wallpaper can be adjusted to Your wall size. All of the photos are made by me. To select click on wallpaper big, and the number of the picture send to my email tomica.book@gmail.com

 

VIETNAMESE COFFEE :

World’s best coffee :) Finally available for you guys. A perfect dring for a perfect beginning of the day. Available in 500g package. Comes with FILTER and CONDENSED MILK (380g).


VIETNAMESE HAT :

Whenever someone says Vietnam, we all think of Asian people wearing conical hats. It’s their most distinctive part of their culture and country, my second home. Order your hat here, and it will be delivered to your home, along with a book of course.
 

MEET AUTHOR :

I deliver you a signed copy of my book in person, and then we drink a beer, two, three...depending on mood :)
 

...and many more.
 

To get more clearer picture of perks, see table below:

If there is some other combination that You had in mind, feel free to suggest it to me, we will make some arrangements. We can hand tailor it according to your wish.
 


 


Few words for the end!

Thank you for still reading this, and hopefully you will like my book.
And who knows, my story might inspire you to do something similar. To spread your wings and fly into the world. It’s not hard. It’s much simpler than we think.
If you have any questions feel free to my email tomica.book@gmail.com
You can follow me on Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.
If you don’t want any of the above by any chance, but still wish to help, you can share this post.

Thank you guys for your support!

Stopirao po Bliskom istoku

Dva tjedna planinario po Himalaji i popeo se na 5416 nadmorske visine
Pio alkohol u Iranu

Spavao u domovima lokalnih ljudi diljem svijeta

Zaljubio se 
Ovo je samo jedan malen dio događaja od jedne velike višegodišnje priče koja je ispisana na stranicama moje debele knjige.  Zašto vam se obraćam?Odgovor je vrlo jednostavan - zato što trebam vašu pomoć!Da bih izdao svoju knjigu čiji je proces abnormalno skup, potrebna mi je vaša pomoć. Potrebni ste mi vi, trebam Vas da podržite ovu kampanju i pomognete mi da mi knjiga ugleda svjetlost dana. I ona bi voljela koračati ovom lijepom planetom, a ne samo mi. A kad se to jednom dogodi, već sljedeći dan doći će na vašu adresu i pokucati vam na vrata. Kako možete biti dio moje kampanje?Proces podržavanja kampanje vrlo je jednostavan: na desnoj strani ove stranice izaberete nagradu (perk) koja vas zanima, kliknete na nju i kupite ju. Da bi dobili oštriju sliku svega, ovdje dolje stavio sam fotografije nagrada čijom kupnjom možete podržati ovu kampanju: e-KNJIGA :Digitalna verzija knjige. Možete ju kupiti posebno, a možete i u kombinaciji s tiskanom knjigom. KNJIGA :Potpisani primjerak Putovanja u Međuzemlje. RAZGLEDNICE :Dobijete 3 razglednice mojih fotografija s putovanja. Za odabir kliknite na razglednice, nakon što izaberete, brojeve istih pošaljite mi na e-mail tomica.book@gmail.com FOTOGRAFIJA NA ZIDU :Sve ponuđene fotografije su moje. Fotografije su u veličini 90x60 cm, printane na visokokvalitetnom foto papiru. Za odabir kliknite na fotografija na zidu, a nakon što ju izaberete, broj iste pošaljite mi na e-mail: tomica.book@gmail.com ZIDNA TAPETE (manja) :Zidna samoljepliva tapeta veličine 120x 220 cm. Pošto je u pitanju interijer, veličina tapete je vrlo flaksibilna, i možemo se lako dogovoriti da ju podesimo prema veličini vašeg zida. Sve ponuđne fotografije tapeta su moje. Za odabir fotografije kliknite na foto tapeta manja, a nakon što ju izaberete, broj iste pošaljite mi e-mail: tomica.book@gmail.com ZIDNA TAPETA (veća) :Zidna samoljepliva tapeta veličine 300 x 220 cm. Pošto je u pitanju interijer, veličina tapete flaksibilna, i možemo se lako dogovoriti da ju podesimo prema veličini vašeg zida. Sve ponuđne fotografije tapeta su moje. Za odabir fotografije kliknite na foto tapeta veća, a nakon što ju izaberete, broj iste pošaljite mi email: tomica.book@gmail.com VIJETNAMSKA KAVA :Najbolja kava na svijetu :) konačno vam je sada dostupna. Savršeni napitak za savršeni početak dana. Kava je pakirana u (500g), i uz nju dobite FILTER te KONDENZIRANO MLIJEKO (380g). VIJETNAMSKI ŠEŠIR :Kad netko spomene Vijetnam, odmah pomislimo na kosooke ljude sa konusnim šeširima na glavi. Definitivno najprepoznatljivi dio njihove kulture, zemlje koja je moj drugi dom. Naručite svoj primjerak ovdje i stići će vam na kućnu adresu. Naravno, uz knjigu. UPOZNAJ AUTORA :Uručujem ti potpisanu knjigu osobno, i častim te s rundom pive, dvije, tri...ovisi o raspoloženju :) Destinacija: Zagreb i Varaždin. PREDAVANJE (TRIBINA):Dolazim u tvoju firmu, kafić, restoran, poslovni ured, školu, knjižnicu...Održat ću dvosatno multimedijsko predavanje na temu mog četverogodišnjeg putovanja po svijetu. ...i još mnoge druge. Da bi dobili još precizniju sliku nagrada (perkova), bacite oko dolje na tablicu:Ako među nagradama nema kombinacije koju biste vi željeli, slobodno mi pošaljite mail pa ćemo se dogovoriti. Složit ćemo nagradu prema vašim željama.    I par riječi za krajHvala vam što još uvijek sve ovo čitate, i nadam se da će vam se svidjeti moja knjiga.I tko zna, možda će vas moja priča potaknuti da i sami učinite nešto slično. Da raširite krila i odletite u svijet. Nije teško. Jednostavnije je nego što mislimo.Ako imate bilo kakvih pitanja ili nejasnoća, slobodno nam pišite na mail tomica.book@gmail.comSlobodno me pratite na facebooku, instagramu i YouTube-u.Ljudi, hvala vam velika na podršci!  *********ENGLISH VERSION*********My name is Tomica Kristić - traveler, travel writer, thru-hiker.Last year I finished 4 years long travel, which I like to refer to as my life venture. I started in Croatia and ended up in New Zealand - all by land. It took me more than 1500 days and 3 continents using one specific and unorthodox means of transport - hitchhike! I hitchhiked more than 40 000 km, and upon arrival I switched my thumb for my feet and walked the entire New Zealand. That’s 1500 km in 3 months. I started my journey with $1.500 in my pocket, so I consider this trip as a low-budget one.This journey brought me hundreds of interesting stories, at the same time rewarding me with a huge amount of life experience which I decided to share with you. That’s why I decided to write a book about my journey. After 9 months of daily writing it came true, naming my book Journey to Middle-earth. It consists of 350 pages amongst you can read about:
my acting (extras) in few Bollywood movies in India
hitchhiking over 2400 km of Oman desert
my ladyboy roommates
how I made friends with Indian shaman at the largest spiritual festival in the world

sleeping inside police stations across Asia 

hitchhiking through the Middle East
volunteering in a school with abandoned children
2 weeks mountain climbing to the Himalayas, reaching 5.416m altitude
drinking alcohol in Iran
my time in jail
sleepovers in local people homes all over the world
falling in love
These are just small bits of a perennial story hidden inside my book’s covers. Why am I talking to you?The answer is pretty simple - I need your help!In order for my book to be published - a very expensive process - I need Your help. This book needs You, Your support for this campaign in order for it to see the light of a day. This book would like to travel this beautiful planet as well. And when that day comes, it will arrive at your address the very next day, knocking at Your door. How can you contribute?The process is very simple: on the right side of this page click the perk that you find interesting, and buy it.To get a more precise picture, you can find photos of perks below: e-BOOK :Digital version of my book. Available with printed version too.BOOK :Signed copy of "Journey to the Middle-earth" book.POSTCARDS :You get 3 postcards of my photos from the journey. To select click on postcards, then send the numbers on following e-mail tomica.book@gmail.com PHOTO ON THE WALL :All of the photos are made by me. Available in 90x60 cm size, printed on high-quality photo paper. To select click on photo on the wall, and the number of the picture send to my email tomica.book@gmail.com WALLPAPER (small size) :Self adhesive wallpaper, size 120x220 cm. Since all the walls are different sizes, selected wallpaper can be adjusted to Your wall size. All of the photos are made by me. To select click on wallpaper small, and the number of the picture send to my email tomica.book@gmail.com WALLPAPER (big size) : Self adhesive wallpaper, size 330x220 cm. Since all the walls are different sizes, selected wallpaper can be adjusted to Your wall size. All of the photos are made by me. To select click on wallpaper big, and the number of the picture send to my email tomica.book@gmail.com VIETNAMESE COFFEE :World’s best coffee :) Finally available for you guys. A perfect dring for a perfect beginning of the day. Available in 500g package. Comes with FILTER and CONDENSED MILK (380g).VIETNAMESE HAT :Whenever someone says Vietnam, we all think of Asian people wearing conical hats. It’s their most distinctive part of their culture and country, my second home. Order your hat here, and it will be delivered to your home, along with a book of course. MEET AUTHOR :I deliver you a signed copy of my book in person, and then we drink a beer, two, three...depending on mood :) ...and many more. To get more clearer picture of perks, see table below:If there is some other combination that You had in mind, feel free to suggest it to me, we will make some arrangements. We can hand tailor it according to your wish.  
Few words for the end!Thank you for still reading this, and hopefully you will like my book.And who knows, my story might inspire you to do something similar. To spread your wings and fly into the world. It’s not hard. It’s much simpler than we think.If you have any questions feel free to my email tomica.book@gmail.comYou can follow me on Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.If you don’t want any of the above by any chance, but still wish to help, you can share this post.Thank you guys for your support!

story:
STORY

A mindful you is a passion project, derived from living in a world where the constant urge to overbuy is paraded in front of us and our children’s eyes everyday.

As parents, we often believe in order to be a good parent, we need to protect our children from disappointment. Therefore, we have a hard time saying no when a child’s desire is financially feasible (e.g. “it’s only a dollar!”). This behavior is not only evidenced in the wealthy, it is a common occurrence in most of our day to day lives. As parents, we do what we can, when we can, because....I guess...we can! In return we gratify our children’s immediate urge to buy “things” because we associate it with their happiness.

Being a professional organizer and interior stylist, I thrive on minimalism and the “less is more” approach. However, as a mother, I too struggle to implement these principles in my everyday life. It is human to want things, to get excited for change, and to want to treat yourself and others you love. 

This behavior is not something to be ashamed of. Instead, it should bring light to the principles of progress, not perfection. What better way to start then introducing this concept to our children, in a whimsical and simple way?

My goal via a “A Mindful You” is to convey a realistic and reasonable message of minimalism, by teaching our youth that mindfulness and simplicity can go a long way. It will show us to really value our possessions and seriously think if we need more. In return, we will automatically implement more gratitude in our lives by focusing on all the things we have and not what we don’t have! Plus...we will seriously help our environment! Win win! 

The Process

During these surreal and isolating times it’s hard to imagine making new friends.  I suppose that’s what makes it all the more special that Jen and I defied those odds and started a friendship. Jen is an illustrator whom I connected with online through a women’s group. We jumped on the phone for the first time but started talking like we had hundreds of conversations like this before; it was very serendipitous. We started chatting about ways to bring ‘ A Mindful You ‘ to life. Figuring out ways to visually portray the beautiful message to children to be mindful of their impact on our home, planet Earth. Jen quickly understood my desire to teach children the value of a day in the sun and a stroll on the beach vs. a new toy. In the hyper material world we live in, it’s easy to get caught up in acquiring things versus appreciating them. It seems the world is begging for us to take a moment and reconsider the systems we have in place. Jen and I are excited to bring to life, ‘ A Mindful You ‘ and hope that through its hand off, children and adults alike will begin to remember the things that bring them the most joy, and to realize that none of it was bought.

Given we are in a era defining moment, I want to get my message into the world as soon as possible and so I have decided to self publish. This allows me to have full control of the publishing timeline and makes it possible to get A Mindful You into the hands and hearts of people ASAP!

What We Need & What You Get

We understand that these are surreal times and while financial support is beyond appreciated,  it isn't our only goal. However if you are able to contribute, you will receive a copy of 'A Mindful You,' and our deepest gratitude. 

We also have different perks for our backers that include:

  • Alternative options to replace single use plastic. (i.e Stasher Bags, Metal Straws).
  • A Zero Waste Starter Kit.
  • A  Portrait Painted by Jen Rose of your liking. As a special Thank You, for your generous support in helping get the message of mindfulness into the world, Jen Rose AKA Rosefur is offering a portrait of you or a loved one. Rosefur's portraits are cherished gems in the LA art scene. She's been painting the public at pop-ups, parties and events and gaining notoriety since 2015. (To see her work, visit her on Instagram @rosefur )
  • Your name/business mentioned and thanked in the book if desired.

 

The Impact

Our goal long term, is to donate a percentage of the proceeds to organizations that are truly making an impact to saving our planet. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't financially contribute to our fundraiser we completely understand. If you would like to support our project it would mean the world to us if you can instead share it with friends and family. Post it on your social media page and follow Tanya on instagram to support her brand and her vision https://www.instagram.com/sos_interiors_/ 

 

"The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the grandest intention"

-Oscar Wilde

Story of My Book

 

bedfellows is a coming-of-age story that explores love, and what being with someone and loving them means, beyond the romance and intimacy we expect.

I wrote this book because I wanted to explore and try to understand the complexities of wanting someone and being with them—what it means to be in love, what it means to be in a relationship. In my own experience, it’s never been as cut and dry as the romances that exist portray and I hope this book serves as a look into the real-life complexities of relationships. 

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the nuanced and raw chaos underneath the surface of relationships and romance. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to wonder and explore what being with someone means, begin to understand what identity and the constant pursuit of who we are really is, and ask questions about what we believe love is, what we’re taught it should be, and what we really truly want it to be beyond that.

The book follows an Indian-American girl, Kash, throughout her teenage years into her early twenties, and navigates the unknowns of falling in love and attraction through her eyes. It’s not easy, and it’s wrought with teenage wanting, attraction, and the visceral confusion of not knowing who she is or what she wants. The story is punctuated by moments where Kash shares a bed with certain people in her life and how sharing such a vulnerable space with someone changes her relationship with them.

If you enjoy exploring the more metaphysical, philosophical side of love and intimacy and unconventional romance as well as the relatable inner chaos of growing up (with copious amounts of angst), then I think you'll enjoy this book.

bedfellows speaks to new adult and coming-of-age readers who want to grapple with both the complexities of growing up and defining ourselves to others, and intimacy—what it means to be with someone and the different ways we fall in love—in a new way.

Ultimately, I hope that bedfellows inspires you to think, challenge, and engage with questions like:

How do we (and do we ever) ‘grow up’ as individuals? 

How do we know what we want? And how do our wants and desires define us?

Can romance and/or attraction be more than just platonic or physical?

What are the different ways we express love, in all its forms?

How does the intimacy and vulnerability of sharing a personal space (i.e. a bed or bedroom, a car, a childhood escape, etc.) affect the way we connect with others?

 

I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with you! I believe discussing, and realizing how different our answers are to these questions, will change us all for the better. 

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

 

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in Winter 2020 through Spring 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this late Spring 2021


When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook.

When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition.

When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.

Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.

You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.

You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.

You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

 

About the Author

 

Nivita Chaliki is a current student at Parsons School of Design in New York, and an artist of many mediums within various genres and areas all of which she simplifies into one word; storyteller. 
Her work is much informed by her experiences navigating identity and culture as an Indian-American girl, as well as a personal creativity with which she tries challenge the norms she sees around her. She loves to get caught up in the wonder of the human mind, and often finds herself within the gray areas of philosophy and design, questioning and learning wherever she can.

She began writing ‘bedfellows’ through a curiosity to dig deeper into what it means to be in a relationship with someone and how we define what we want as individuals. Inspired by her own experiences and inner struggles with translating conventional romance into real-life relationships, finding who she wants to be, and her own conflicting identity growing up as an Indian-American, Nivita wanted to tell this story to try and narrate the visceral tension and chaos of being young and trying to understand what we want both from ourselves and others. She hopes this book also contributes to a lacking but growing space of representation for South Asian diaspora, and their stories.

For more information, you can connect with Nivita Chaliki at nchaliki@yahoo.com and @nivitachaliki on Instagram. Please reach out if you have any questions, concerns, or just general wonderments!

 

Risks & Challenges

 

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #bedfellows and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page!

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!!

I truly appreciate it and hope to keep you all updated as the process continues. 

Thank you again,
Nivita Chaliki

Inspired by her own experiences and inner struggles with translating conventional romance into real-life relationships, finding who she wants to be, and her own conflicting identity growing up as an Indian-American, Nivita wanted to tell this story to try and narrate the visceral tension and chaos of being young and trying to understand what we want both from ourselves and others. She hopes this book also contributes to a lacking but growing space of representation for South Asian diaspora, and their stories.For more information, you can connect with Nivita Chaliki at nchaliki@yahoo.com and @nivitachaliki on Instagram. Please reach out if you have any questions, concerns, or just general wonderments!
 
Risks & Challenges
 
The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 
Other Ways You Can Help
 
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #bedfellows and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.
You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page!
Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.
Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!!I truly appreciate it and hope to keep you all updated as the process continues. Thank you again,Nivita Chaliki

story:
Story of My Book

Unbreakable is about accepting who you are and the stigma around mental health which is why a lot of people silently struggle.


My name is, Carolyn Skowron, and I am the author of Unbreakable. I wrote this book because I want to help raise awareness of mental health issues, and help end the stigma. We need to start talking about mental health and be less judgmental of each other. We need to start treating one another with more respect and empathy, as well as recognize that we are all unique, special, and should never give up. In writing this book, my hope is that it might save at least one life.

Almost 1 in 5 adults suffer from a mental illness. In 2017, roughly 46.6 million people were diagnosed with mental health issues in the United States alone. If you or someone you know struggles with mental health, know that you are not alone. My hope is that Unbreakable will help others to find the courage they need to speak up, and seek help. You will see, through the stories I share, that you are worth it and that perspective is everything. I want people to find their own passions and become happy from within themselves and live a more positive and healthy life. It is time we start being real and vulnerable because life is too short to not make the most of it. We need to not be so ashamed of our issues and be open and honest with each other. Most importantly we need to to understand that none of us are perfect, we are all perfectly imperfect. 

In this book, you'll learn about self-acceptance and self-love. You'll hear stories about:

Early childhood bullying, and how this can effect you as you grow up 

How the stigma and judgement can really affect your self confidence and worth 

How I changed my perspective as I grabbed my seat belt three seconds before a car accident and luckily survived

Unbreakable is a nonfiction book that speaks to teens and young adults, and is important to read if you want to learn more as well as be more aware about mental health. It will also will show that you are not alone, and with the right tools and support you can get through anything.

Unbreakable

THIS BOOK IS DIVIDED INTO 4 PARTS:
Part 1 Contains the introduction + chapters 1-4. From the introduction to chapter 4 you see how the words and actions of young adolescent experiences can really have an impact on confidence and self-worth growing up. This section also shows that none of us are the same, we are all different, and so are our struggles. I also show you that even though I almost got to the point of ending my life, I thankfully got help and realized that it was okay to not be okay, but I needed to get help. I learned silently struggling is not the answer, help is. I also share that no one deserves to treat someone differently because of who they are, as we are all broken in someway, and we all are human.

Part 2 Contains chapters 5-9. From chapters 5 to 9 you will see how even when you think giving up is the answer, there is always hope, and there is a light at the end of tunnel. You will see how important it is to surround yourself with good people and to make sure you have a more positive outlook on life, even in the darkest of times. As much as it’s great to have people look out for you, you have to also watch out for yourself. Sometimes, you have to be able to save yourself. It is important to put yourself first. I show, through my own experiences, how much the stigma of mental health affects society and many adolescents today. I talk about the misconception of when people think “you have it all” when in fact, you don’t; not if you’re lacking true happiness within yourself. Materialistic things don’t bring one happiness, only being happy with who we are can bring that. We can do this by becoming stronger and more confident in ourselves if we buy into getting and recieving help. 

Part 3 Contains chapters 9-11. From chapters 9-11 you will see how important it is to live each day to the fullest, as well as not let other people get in the way of your happiness. We all make mistakes but it is important to learn from them and not regret our past. We need to look at each opportunity as a chance to grow into a stronger more resilient individual. Our mistakes aren’t what define us, they are what make us human, because none of us live a perfect life. We can’t change the past but we can learn and use those experiences to have different outcomes in the future. You will also see how “trying to please everyone” is nearly impossible, and you will drive yourself crazy trying to do so. Letting other people determine what you do because of the sole fact that you want to please them will be more detrimental to your mental health than you think. The most important thing to remember is that your flaws do not define you and what people think of you doesn’t matter. All that matters is that you are happy, and can find happiness with yourself.

Part 4 Contains chapters 12-14. From chapters 12-14 you will see how through writing this book, I found myself. I learn that life can’t be forced, and that it is a constant journey with twists and turns. Life is about adapting and adjusting because nothing in life goes as planned. I show after years of my own struggles that it is important to do what brings you joy, and focus on how you want to live. Live your life, do not worry about everyone else's, and find what makes you happy. If we spread a little more love, and we're a little more empathetic, we might be able to live in a better and less toxic world. I close with showing you that life will never be perfect, but we are constantly growing into a better version of ourselves. We should never try to be anyone but ourselves and we should be kind to each other because a smile can go a long way.

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in [April, 2021].

The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)

The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).

The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.

The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this [Spring].


When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook. I have personally decided to donate any profit made after 250 books are pre-sold to two very special causes. Half will go to NAMI (National Alliance of Mental Illness) as this is an important organization to me because I am apart of it but I also want others to be aware of how important mental health is. The other half of the proceeds will be donated to Leukemia and Lymphoma Society as I recently learned this week one of my best friends has just been diagnosed with leukemia and I would love to help in anyway possible. 

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.

Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.

You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.

You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.

You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

About the Author

Carolyn Skowron is a recent college graduate from Chatham University with a degree in marketing. She is a presenter for National Alliance on Mental Illness (NAMI) and has a passion for helping others. She is a resilient and driven individual who is surprising herself with this new endeavor of becoming an author. She has a big heart and is empathetic towards others, and hopes that this book will bring awareness and empathy towards those who have been in a similar position as her. 

Carolyn wrote this book because a life threatening car accident changed her view of life. She’d like for that new perspective to inspire others as it has her, as well as have an impact on teens and young adults in particular, so that they may learn to be less harsh on themselves and each other. Her passion is helping people and making people smile. She’d like to see the stigma of mental illness end, and for people to be more kind to one another.

Carolyn enjoys reading and hanging out with friends but at the same time, she loves to just relax and watch Netflix. She also enjoys baking and is in the process of learning how to cook more than just spaghetti and ramen. She has a very sarcastic but witty personality, and her friends like to make fun of her klutziness, considering she has had four concussions.

For more information, you can connect with Carolyn Skowron at carolyn.skowron@gmail.com and on instagram: @Carolyn9787 and twitter as well @SkowronCarolyn. 
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #[Unbreakable] and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Carolyn Skowron

story:
More about the Book

Lee Miller was one of the most extraordinary, courageous and talented women of the twentieth century. Award-winning poet Jacqueline Saphra was captured by Miller’s incredible photographs and her exuberant life. A Bargain with the Light: Poems after Lee Miller is a heroic crown of sonnets, a unique tribute to this inspirational figure. Included in the book is an introduction by the art historian Patricia Allmer, which places Miller’s achievements in the context of her time, an essay by the author charting her journey through Miller’s story to the writing of the poems, plus iconic photographs by and of Miller, courtesy of the Lee Miller Archives.

Hercules Editions

Is one of the most innovative and exciting new poetry presses to emerge in the last five years. In our short time as publishers, we have released new work by authors such as Sue Rose, Hannah Lowe, Claire Crowther, Sean O'Brien and Ruth Valentine. Our ethos is to produce books which incorporate poems with visual material, to create a unique merging of text and image. Our books are published in limited editions of 300, and are signed by the author, making them collectors' items for the future.

Why Contribute to Our Campaign?

For independent small press publishing to continue to exist, we need your help. What you receive in return is not just knowing you have contributed to an interesting project, but being part of the book and the activities around it.

We are fortunate to receive a grant from Arts Council, England, but in these difficult times for the arts, we are asking for extra support from our readers. We have run Indiegogo campaigns for each of our titles, to raise additional funds for marketing and promotion. We have some brilliant offers for our sponsors (who we view as an integral part of the Hercules community) and we are proud to be able to list their names in each of our publications. For our most generous contributors, there is the opportunity to receive a special edition of the book with extra material supplied by the author, and the chance to attend some exclusive events.

We are counting on the support of those of you who love poetry and who are passionate about the work of independent publishers, such as ourselves. This is an exciting time for us, and we hope you will share in our project.

story:
What is it?

A second chance to get the first issue of Eight Bit magazine. Reprinted in full colour.

Eight Bit Magazine  celebrated early eight bit microcomputers from the 1970's to the early 90's. While most publications cover only the gaming aspect of such computers we want to cover the hardware and programming side of things as well.

What will you get?

An A5 sized, 68 page magazine full of great articles written by people with a wealth of knowledge and passion for those computers.

What articles are in Issue 1?

Well, see for yourself?

The main articles are: 

Genesis 1972 to 1983
Interview with the founder of Scene World
The 1980's computer revolution in Yugoslavia
The Collectors guide to the Commodore 64
Apple's 40th Birthday
Programming the 8-bits
Plus game reviews

Why reprint?

Issue 1 was a low production run and we are still getting requests for it. Recently we have sold all copies. So our aim is to republish it.

What computers are covered in this and future issues?

All the 8-bits such as the Apple II, Atari 8-bits, Amstrad CPC, BBC Micro, Commodore 64, Sinclair Spectrum etc.

Current and Previous Work

Currently working on Eight Big Magazine. Issue 2 is being printed and issue 3 is in development. We have subscriptions up to Issue 13 and our aim is to go much further than that. Check out our website: www.eightbitmagazine.com 

Previously worked on a fanzine called CPC Oxygen covering all the 8 bit computers from Amstrad. You can view old issues of CPC Oxygen here: 
http://eightbitmagazine.com/cpcoxygen/index.html

You can download the CPC Oxygen Yearbook 2004 for free from here: http://www.lulu.com/shop/cpc-oxygen-team/the-cpc-oxygen-yearbook-amstrad-cpc/ebook/product-17484274.html

I was involved in getting the rights from Future Publishing to scan and put online issues of Amstrad Action. With the help of a number of people in the Amstrad community all 117 issues were online in a matter of weeks.

You can still view those issues here: 
http://eightbitmagazine.com/cpcoxygen/aa.html

I also wrote a number of retro articles for Micro Mart magazine in the early 2000's.
